sources.title: The Firing Line
sources.description: A mercenary hired by a Central American government to stop a rebel movement ends up training the rebels.

metadata.Plot: An American military advisor becomes disillusioned by the brutality and corruption of the Central American government which hired him. When his shift in sympathies becomes known, he's arrested and tortured but soon escapes, along with a beautiful American woman, in order to join the rebels.
metadata.Actors: Reb Brown, Shannon Tweed, Kahlena Marie
